scripts.dev: npm run compile:electron && concurrently --kill-others "vite --port 5173" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron dist-electron/main.js"
scripts.dev:safe: npm run compile:electron && vite --port 5173 & wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron dist-electron/main.js
scripts.electron:build: npm run build && npm run compile:electron && electron-builder
scripts.electron:serve: npm run compile:electron && concurrently --kill-others "vite --port 5173" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && electron dist-electron/main.js"
